name: KUB - A (not so) planar game
description:
KUB is a 2D game.

No, really. It is on your screen, it can only be 2D, right ?

...right ?

Relax, don't think about it too hard. You'll get more than enough time to do so.

Controls are mapped to :

ZQSD : Up / Left / Down / Right

Space : Jump (hold to jump higher)

Esc : Pause menu

All buttons are accessible and rebindable in the main menu.
